DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_CONNECTED.description: The notification the user sees when authetnicated with the devices server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_ERROR.description: The error notification the user sees with the error for the websocket server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_DISCONNECT.message: Deconectat de la serverul de dispozitive
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_SOCKET_DISCONNECT.description: The notification the user sees when disconnected from the devices server

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET_TI.description: The title of the question dialog the user sees when there is another connection with his id

DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET.message: Mai exista o instanta de Studio activa si puteti folosi doar o instanta la un moment dat. Dotiti sa folositi Studio aici?
DEVICE_WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_INSTANCE_RESET.description: The question dialog text the user sees when there is another instance connected with his id

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_NOT_VALI.message: Va rog dati un nume pentru dispozitivul nou
WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME_NOT_VALI.description: The message the user receives when he did not eneter a valid name for a new device

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_TITLE.description: The title of the dialog with instructions on how to add a new device

WYAPP_WEBSOCKET_NEW_DEVICE_NAME.description: The name of the device with instructions on how to add a new device
